description: Ichi is an antagonist from http://anidb.net/a6503 [Naruto Shippuuden 3: Inheritors of the Will of Fire]. He is a shinobi and one of http://anidb.net/ch16975 [Hiruko]`s three followers, along with http://anidb.net/ch17143 [Ni] and http://anidb.net/ch17142 [San]. He almost perfectly resembles a mirror image of San, except that he only has a single mark on his forehead. He has a mark on his back that is the same as the one in Hiruko`s left palm.
name: Ichi
